item.title: External resources
item.description: There is currently an introduction to Myriad and a How to guide on creating a simple generator Applied Metaprogramming with Myriad and Falanx - This is a video I made for my YouTube channel which covers some details on Myriad. Myriad Intro - This is a blog post I wrote around the time of Applied Metaprogramming with Myriad and Falanx which has details of making a generator that produces this simple module:
